description: Derby County are closing in on a deal for Viking centre-back Sondre Langas.
title: Derby closing in on defender Langas
title_page: Derby closing in on defender Langas - BBC Sport
maintext:
Derby County are closing in on a deal for Viking centre-back Sondre Langas.
It has been reported that the fee for Langas will be around Â£4m, although sources have told BBC Radio Derby that the rumoured price may not be accurate.
The Norway international played all 90 minutes in 26 of the Norwegian side's 30 Eliteserien games last season and will help to soften the blow if Rams defender Eiran Cashin departs for Brighton.
